author: all adam
comment: Easy on battery life...I wish for more color options like orange & yellow

reply.author: GreenMan Digital
reply.content: Thanks for your review, I have been very busy with work, but I will try to update this watch face in the near future. Different colours are possible. Ideally I would like to implement a colour picker so any colour options would work.

title: Great face!

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: A nice analogue face with digital time, date, battery, and card previews.
title: Nicely made

author: Luqman Shafiq
comment: Just switched from G Watch to the G Watch R and i have to say temporary burn in was an issue with stock watch faces. Switched to this watch face and never switched to others. Perhaps on the next update, the size of the analogue line to be different when on and ambient mode? Thicker when on and thin on ambient would be useful

reply.author: GreenMan Digital
reply.content: Hi Luqman,  thanks for the feedback. I'll see what I can implement.

title: Prevents burn in

author: Joel G
comment: Downloaded but could never find the face. EDIT: I uninstalled it and reinstalled it and now it works fine. Just the watch face I wanted

reply.author: GreenMan Digital
reply.content: Hi Joel, that's weird. I've always gotten the watch face after installing it. I'm glad you solved the problem and are enjoying the watch face.

title: Didn't show up

author: Shukry Hassan
comment: One of the best minimalist watch faces to have.
title: Minimalist

author: Garrick Gleason
comment: Great and simple watch face that does not drain any extra battery, though I don't have weather enabled. Edit: moto 360 compatibility is working now and looks great!

reply.author: GreenMan Digital
reply.content: Hi Garrick, thanks for letting me know that the moto 360 compatibility is working now. Glad you like it. Would you mind posting a picture to the g+ community page so that I can see what it looks like? Thanks. https://plus.google.com/communities/103092809042511312071

title: Love it

author: Gelo Goloy
comment: The added numbers on the side are great!

author: Walker Schutze
comment: Really nice looking watch face. Would love a weather option - I know you're adding a settings page soon so I'm sure its coming!

reply.author: GreenMan Digital
reply.content: Hi Walker, thanks :) Weather and some other widgets/indicators are coming soon.

title: Great job!

author: Ben Reinhardt
comment: I like the digital and classical watch face combination!
title: Great watch face!
